subsections.description: There are 6 generators around the map that give power to the surrounding areas. Interact on a generator to start the process, then stand on the metal floor until it's fully powered. Later during the game, the generators can be attacked by Templars. If the Templars successfully unpower a generator, it can be powered again the same way.

pic.alt: Generator 2 - between spawn and the Workshop
Generator 3 - between spawn and the Workshop

subsections.description: Once all 6 power generators are active, the Pack-a-Punch machine will be unlocked at the top of the Excavation Site.

There are 3 Giant Robots that occasionally walk through the map. Thor walks through the trenches, Odin walks across No Man's Land, and Freya walks by the Church. The Giant Robots always walk on the same footprints, and red lights will blink before they step in the footprint. Being stepped on will instantly down you. Sometimes, one of the 2 feet will have a yellow circle on the bottom that can be shot to open a door. Being stepped on with the door opened will take you inside the Giant Robot's head.

Around the map there are small piles of dirt and skulls that you can dig for rewards. Each player must first find a shovel around the map, then they can dig unlimited piles. It is recommended to wait for the map to be snowing before digging so the Staff of Ice parts can be found quicker.
The Tank can be ridden around the map and moves between the Church and the Tank Station by Generator 2. It always starts in the Church, and moving the tank costs 500 points.

Each player has 3 trials they can complete, and there is an additional fourth trial shared between all players. The trials can be seen next to Generators 1 and 6. Hover over a trial to view the requirements and interact to get the reward. Each player will see their character's name above their trials. Upon powering up Generator 1 the first time, the ritual box will spawn a power-up that can be collected at any time.

pic.alt: Mule Kick - downstairs in the Excavation Site
Location 2 - in the Wind Tunnel near Generator 4

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located between Generator 1 and Generator 3 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - in a wheelbarrow near the door to spawn
Location 2 - at the end of the Fire Tunnel
Location 3 - in the trench between Generator 3 and Speed Cola

subsections.description: Located in Giant Robot footprints around the Excavation Site (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the right footprint between the Excavation Site and Generator 5
Location 2 - in the right footprint between the Excavation Site and Generator 4
Location 3 - in the right footprint by Generator 4

subsections.description: Located between Generator 1 and Generator 2 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - next to a wheelbarrow near the door to spawn
Location 2 - in the Giant Robot footprint on the roof of the Tank Station next to Generator 2
Location 3 - in a wheelbarrow at the end of the trench past the door to the Workshop

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Each player can equip the shield.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in the Wind Tunnel near Generator 4

sections.description: Collect 3 parts and craft at a workbench.

subsections.description: Located near the Church (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - in the mud in front of the Tank's path
Location 2 - in the mud behind the Tank's path
Location 3 - at the end of the Ice Tunnel

subsections.description: Located in spawn.
Located around the Excavation Site (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - at the top of the Excavation Site, to the PaP machine's right
Location 2 - at the top of the secret stairs, to the left of the Gramophone table
Location 3 - on some scaffolding next to the staff statues

subsections.description: Build at one of the 3 workbenches. Only 1 player can equip the Maxis Drone. After using, the Maxis Drone will reappear at the workbench.

pic.alt: One possible build location, in the Church

sections.description: Staffs are crafted separately and can be done in any order.

subsections.description: The Gramophone and Black Record are required before crafting the staffs.

step.title: Find the Black Record
step.description: Located around the Excavation Site (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - at the start of the ramp going from the Workshop door to the top of the Excavation Site
Location 2 - in a wheelbarrow to the left of the Pack-a-Punch machine
Location 3 - on the wall between Generator 5 and the Church

step.title: Pick up the Gramophone
step.description: Located down the stairs at the Excavation Site (2 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - to the right of the table
Location 2 - to the left of the table

step.title: Unlock the secret stairs
step.description: After getting the Gramophone and Black Record, place the Gramophone on the table down the stairs at the Excavation Site. Once the secret spiral stairs have opened, you can pick up the Gramophone. The Gramophone can only be placed in one location around the map at a time, and must be picked up before it can be placed in a new location. When the Gramophone is picked up, it is accessible for all players to place it down somewhere else.

pic.alt: Gramophone on the table to unlock the secret stairs

step.title: Collect 3 staff parts
step.description: The first part is found in the Rituals of the Ancients box by Generator 6 after powering it the first time. The second part is found near the Excavation Site after shooting down a glowing orange plane. The third part is dropped after killing a Panzer.

pic.alt: Part 1 - in the Rituals of the Ancients box by Generator 6
Part 2 - on the ground between the 2 footprints in front of the Excavation Site

step.title: Find the Fire Record
step.description: Located near the Church (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on the pillar by the stairs that lead upstairs into the Church (seen easier after the Tank is moved)
Location 2 - on a pew upstairs in the Church
Location 3 - on a box by Generator 6

step.title: Get the Fire Crystal
step.description: Enter the Fire Tunnel between Generator 1 and Generator 3 and place the Gramophone to open the portal to The Crazy Place. Go through the portal and pick up the Fire Crystal. Interact on the glowing circle to create a portal to leave. After returning to the tunnel, it is recommended to pick up the Gramophone.

step.title: Craft the staff
step.description: Go downstairs in the Excavation Site and craft the staff at the corresponding statue.

step.title: Collect 3 staff parts
step.description: Each of the 3 Giant Robots has one of the parts in its head.

pic.alt: Part 1 - in the Odin Giant Robot that walks across No Man's Land
Part 2 - in the Thor Giant Robot that walks through the trenches
Part 3 - in the Freya Giant Robot that walks by the Church

step.title: Find the Wind Record
step.description: Located near Generator 5 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - to the right of Stamin-Up
Location 2 - on some boxes outside the entrance to the Lightning Tunnel
Location 3 - on a table inside the entrance of the Lightning Tunnel

step.title: Get the Wind Crystal
step.description: Enter the Wind Tunnel by Generator 4 and place the Gramophone to open the portal to The Crazy Place. Go through the portal and pick up the Wind Crystal. Interact on the glowing circle to create a portal to leave. After returning to the tunnel, it is recommended to pick up the Gramophone.

step.title: Craft the staff
step.description: Go downstairs in the Excavation Site and craft the staff at the corresponding statue.

step.title: Collect 3 staff parts
step.description: Each of the parts requires jumping off the Tank at a specific point outside the normal playable area.

pic.alt: Part 1 - on the way from the Church to the Tank Station by Generator 2
Part 2 - on the way from the Tank Station by Generator 2 to the Church
Part 3 - on the way from the Tank Station by Generator 2 to the Church

step.title: Find the Lightning Record
step.description: Located near Generator 4 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a cart between Generator 4 and the Excavation Site
Location 2 - to the left of Juggernog
Location 3 - at the end of the Wind Tunnel

step.title: Get the Lightning Crystal
step.description: Enter the Lightning Tunnel by Generator 5 and place the Gramophone to open the portal to The Crazy Place. Go through the portal and pick up the Lightning Crystal. Interact on the glowing circle to create a portal to leave. After returning to the tunnel, it is recommended to pick up the Gramophone.

step.title: Craft the staff
step.description: Go downstairs in the Excavation Site and craft the staff at the corresponding statue.

step.title: Collect 3 staff parts
step.description: Each of the parts are found randomly when digging on rounds where it's snowing. The map is split into 3 regions with 1 part per region.

pic.alt: Part 2 - dug in No Man's Land

step.title: Find the Ice Record
step.description: Located in the Tank Station by Generator 2 (3 possible locations).

pic.alt: Location 1 - on a desk by the door leading to Generator 2
Location 2 - to the right of the Mystery Box location
Location 3 - on some shelves by the exit to the mud Tank path

step.title: Get the Ice Crystal
step.description: Enter the Ice Tunnel by Generator 6 and place the Gramophone to open the portal to The Crazy Place. Go through the portal and pick up the Ice Crystal. Interact on the glowing circle to create a portal to leave. After returning to the tunnel, it is recommended to pick up the Gramophone.

step.title: Craft the staff
step.description: Go downstairs in the Excavation Site and craft the staff at the corresponding statue.

sections.description: Staffs are upgraded separately and can be done in any order. Any Elemental Staff can be upgraded before crafting the other staffs.

subsections.description: All 4 staff upgrades follow the same general process.

step.title: Unique upgrade steps
step.description: After crafting the staff, it must be used for a unique step in The Crazy Place. Then, it must be used for a unique step in the normal map. See below for more info.

step.title: Set the levers
step.description: Go downstairs in the Excavation Site. There are 4 levers that each cycle the color on one of the circles in the middle of the room. Interact with the levers until all 4 circles glow the correct color for the staff. The Staff of Fire requires red, the Staff of Wind requires yellow, the Staff of Lightning requires purple, and the Staff of Ice require blue.

step.title: Shoot the orb
step.description: After the 4 circles are set correctly, shoot the orb with the staff. It will rise into the sky and disappear. Each staff has a different colored orb.

step.title: Get kills in The Crazy Place
step.description: Enter The Crazy Place through any of the 4 portals, then place the staff on the corresponding pedestal. Kill zombies next to the staff until enough souls have been collected. After enough kills, pick up the upgraded staff.

subsections.description: After these steps, follow the upgrade process steps above.

step.title: Kill zombies to light the fires
step.description: Go to the Fire section in The Crazy Place. Kill zombies with the Staff of Fire over the metal grates on the floor. After enough kills, all 4 fires will be lit.

pic.alt: Metal grates with 4 lit fires at the wall

step.title: Shoot the torches in the Church
step.description: There are 7 symbols upstairs in the Church and TODO will be glowing. Use the image below to match the symbols to a set of numbers. Downstairs in the Church there are 7 torches, each with a number next to it. Quickly shoot the TODO torches corresponding to the numbers from the image.

pic.alt: (TODO edit) The 7 symbols and corresponding numbers

subsections.description: After these steps, follow the upgrade process steps above.

step.title: Spin the 4 circles
step.description: Go to the Wind section in The Crazy Place. On the ceiling there are 4 circles with symbols on them. Shoot the circles with the Staff of Wind until they match the symbol order below.

pic.alt: Close-up of the symbol order pointing towards the TODO section

step.title: Shoot the 3 smoking stones
step.description: There are 3 stones around No Man's Land that must be shot in the correct direction. Shoot the stone with the Excavation Site behind it so the smoke flies towards the Excavation Site.

pic.alt: Location 3 - by the mud path between the Church and Generator 5

subsections.description: After these steps, follow the upgrade process steps above.

step.title: Shoot 3 sets of 3 symbols
step.description: Go to the Lightning section in The Crazy Place. Using the numbering system on the image, shoot these 3 sets of symbols in any order using the Staff of Lightning: 1-3-6, 3-5-7, 2-4-6.

step.title: Set the 7 dials
step.description: There are 7 dials around the map that must be turned to a certain direction.

pic.alt: Dial 5 - near the Excavation Site by the path going to the Church, set up
Dial 6 - downstairs in the Church, set right
Dial 7 - upstairs in the Church, set up

subsections.description: After these steps, follow the upgrade process steps above.

step.title: Match the 6 symbols
step.description: Go to the Ice section in The Crazy Place. There is a wall with a glowing symbol on it, and there are 6 stones with symbols in the air. The chart below shows which wall symbols correspond to which stone symbols. Using the Staff of Ice, shoot the stone that corresponds to the symbol on the wall and repeat until all 6 stones are facing up.

step.title: Destroy 3 graves
step.description: There are 3 graves that must be shot with the Staff of Ice to be frozen, then shot with a bullet gun to be destroyed.

pic.alt: Location 1 - outside the Tank Station near Generator 2
Location 2 - near the footprint by Generator 4
Location 3 - on the Excavation Site hill

sections.description: Complete the shared bottom trial of the Rituals of the Ancients. Taking(TODO) the reward will upgrade your melee attack to a powerful punch.

subsections.description: There are 4 chests in the Giant Robot footprints that must be filled with zombie souls. Kill enough zombies next to each chests until they disappear. If a Giant Robot steps on the chest, its progress will be reset.
All players can now go to either of the 2 Rituals of the Ancients locations and claim the reward(TODO).

sections.description: Each player who wants the G-Strike Beacon must cleanse a tablet.

subsections.description: Go to the Tank Station next to Generator 2. In the back of the room, there is a table with 4 tablets on it. Each player can take one tablet.

subsections.header: Cleanse the Tablet in the Church
subsections.description: Place the tablet in the holy water upstairs in the Church. Get melee kills next to the tablet until enough zombie souls have been collected.

subsections.header: Carefully Carry the Tablet to the Tank Station
subsections.description: Pick up the tablet from the holy water, then walk back to the Tank Station without touching any mud. If you step on any mud on the way back, you have to cleanse it in the Church again. Place the cleansed tablet on the original table in the Tank Station.
Get more melee kills next to the tablet until the G-Strike Beacon appears on the table. Interact to pick up the G-Strike Beacon.

bullets: All 4 Elemental Staffs crafted and upgraded

subsections.description: Craft and upgrade each of the 4 Elemental Staffs. Power on all 6 generators is required to finish the step.

subsections.header: 2. Place the 4 Staffs in Pedestals (Ascend from Darkness)
subsections.description: Each of the upgraded staffs must be placed in specific pedestals. The staffs cannot be used again until the step is over.

pic.alt: Fire Staff pedestal - downstairs in the Excavation Site
Lightning Staff pedestal - in the Thor Giant Robot that walks through the trenches
Wind Staff pedestal - in the Odin Giant Robot that walks across No Man's Land
Ice Staff pedestal - in the Freya Giant Robot that walks by the Church

subsections.header: 3. Press the Button and Fire the G-Strike Beacon (Rain Fire)
subsections.description: All 3 Giant Robots will keep marching across the map, and each time they march, one of the feet can be entered. One player must enter the Giant Robot and press the red button inside its head. Quickly after pressing the button, throw a G-Strike Beacon at a small TODO outside of Generator 5. When done correctly, TODO hole.

pic.alt: Red button inside the Giant Robot head

subsections.header: 4. Launch the Maxis Drone and Kill Panzers (Unleash the Horde)
subsections.description: Release the Maxis Drone near the hole in the ground from the previous step. It will fly inside, then several Panzers will fly out. Kill all the Panzers.

pic.alt: Maxis Drone flying towards the pit
Panzers flying out of the pit

subsections.header: 5. Shoot Down the Plane and Kill the Pilot (Skewer the Winged Beast)
subsections.description: Shoot the glowing orange plane flying around the map. The plane is only visible while using Zombie Blood. After being shot down, the pilot zombie will run around the Excavation Site area clockwise. The zombie can only be seen while using Zombie Blood, but it can be a different use of Zombie Blood than the one that was used to shoot down the plane. Run around counterclockwise to find the zombie, then kill it so it drops the Maxis Drone. Pick up the Maxis Drone.

pic.alt: Maxis Drone dropped from pilot zombie

subsections.header: 6. Upgrade the One Inch Punch (Wield a Fist of Iron)
subsections.description: All players must upgrade their One Inch Punch. Go downstairs in the Excavation Site and use the One Inch Punch to kill templar zombies with a white glow. After enough have been killed, the last one will drop a tablet that must be picked up to upgrade the One Inch Punch. Each player must get enough kills with the One Inch Punch to get their own tablet.

pic.alt: Tablet to upgrade One Inch Punch

subsections.header: 7. Kill Templar Zombies in The Crazy Place (Raise Hell)
subsections.description: Before starting this step, make sure all 6 generators are powered. Go to The Crazy Place and place all 4 upgraded staffs in the altars. Then, kill templar zombies until enough souls fly up in the middle. After enough kills, a rift will appear in the air.

pic.alt: All 4 upgraded staffs placed in The Crazy Place

subsections.description: Release the Maxis Drone so it flies into the rift. (TODO enter light?, paste achievement and cutscene info) If the cutscene does not start, powering all 6 generators should fix it.

pic.alt: Maxis Drone flying into the rift

subsections.description: Interact with 3 green Element 115 meteorites.

pic.alt: Location 1 - in spawn, near the door to Generator 3
Location 2 - in the Workshop, near the door to No Man's Land
Location 3 - on some scaffolding near Pack-a-Punch

subsections.description: Interact with 3 radios.

pic.alt: Location 1 - downstairs in the Excavation Site, on some scaffolding
Location 2 - in The Crazy Place, hugging the wall between the Fire and Lightning sections
Location 3 - in the Freya Giant Robot that walks by the Church

subsections.description: Go prone and interact on both number 1 icons at Generator 1, then do the same for one of the number 5 icons at Generator 5.
This can be activated once per round. Shoot the 3 flaming carts with the Staff of Ice, then pick up the Zombie Blood from the top of the Excavation Site.

pic.alt: Cart 2 - near the path to the Workshop
Cart 3 - between Generator 4 and the Church

subsections.description: Go to the Excavation Site and look towards the Church. Using a sniper, aim down the sniper scope to the burning window.

sections.description: Play Remember Forever and get a Max Ammo (Black Ops III only)

subsections.description: Go downstairs in the Excavation Site by the staff statues. Looking up, there is a circle with 4 invisible wisps on each side. Looking at the wisps while in Zombie Blood will reveal their colors, but this is not required. Shoot each of the 4 wisps with the corresponding Elemental Staff.

pic.alt: Circle with 4 wisps, seen with Zombie Blood

subsections.description: Interact with a Samantha doll in the center of The Crazy Place. A particle effect will show the game has started. Then, shoot all 6 Samantha dolls. If you run out of time, Samantha will laugh, and you have to start the game again at the original doll.

pic.alt: The doll to start hide and seek
The 6 Samantha dolls, in the center of The Crazy Place

subsections.description: The original doll will respawn and float upwards. When it flies all the way up, you'll get a Max Ammo and the song will play.
